com.crawljax.core.configuration
Class ThreadConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.crawljax.core.configuration.ThreadConfiguration

public class ThreadConfiguration
extends Object

This class denotes all the configuration variable that can be set with regard to the number of Threads active.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Stefan Lenselink

Field Summary
private  boolean browserBooting
          is the Booting (pre-loading) of browsers in use? Default to true;
private static int DEFAULT_SLEEP_TIME_ON_BROWSER_CREATION_FAILURE
          Default SleepTimeOnBrowserCreationFailure == 10 seconds == 10000 Millisecond.
private  int numberBrowserCreateRetries
          The total number of retries when a browser can not be created.

private  boolean numberThreadsSet
          Internal only flag variable.
private  int sleepTimeOnBrowserCreationFailure
          The number of milliseconds to sleep when a browser can not be created.

Field Detail

DEFAULT_SLEEP_TIME_ON_BROWSER_CREATION_FAILURE

private static final int DEFAULT_SLEEP_TIME_ON_BROWSER_CREATION_FAILURE
Default SleepTimeOnBrowserCreationFailure == 10 seconds == 10000 Millisecond.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

numberThreads

private int numberThreads
The number of threads to run at the same time inside Crawljax. Default is 1. when this is not set and the number of browsers is set the number of threads equals the number of browsers.

numberThreadsSet

private boolean numberThreadsSet
Internal only flag variable.

numberBrowsers

private int numberBrowsers
The maximum number of opened browsers to use. Default if this is not set it is set to the number of threads numberThreads

numberBrowsersSet

private boolean numberBrowsersSet
Internal only flag variable.

browserBooting

private boolean browserBooting
is the Booting (pre-loading) of browsers in use? Default to true;

numberBrowserCreateRetries

private int numberBrowserCreateRetries
The total number of retries when a browser can not be created.

sleepTimeOnBrowserCreationFailure

private int sleepTimeOnBrowserCreationFailure
The number of milliseconds to sleep when a browser can not be created.

Constructor Detail

ThreadConfiguration

public ThreadConfiguration(int browsers,
                           int threads,
                           boolean useBooting)
Initialise everything directly.

Parameters:
browsers - the number of browsers to use
threads - the number of threads to use
useBooting - is the booting in use?

ThreadConfiguration

public ThreadConfiguration(int browsers)
Specify only the number of browsers. This constructor makes the number of threads equal to the number of browsers.

Parameters:
browsers - the number of browsers to use.

ThreadConfiguration

public ThreadConfiguration()
Default 'init' constructor.
